definitions.definition: A jibe , reproach , or taunt , especially one made in a good-natured or teasing manner .
( informal ) An annoying or foolish person .

( British , Ireland , dialectal , archaic ) A person who chatters or gossips inanely ; a chatterer , a gossip or gossiper ; also, a person who divulges private information about others or is indiscreet ; a tattletale .

main_definition: A jibe , reproach , or taunt , especially one made in a good-natured or teasing manner .
secondary_definitions: ( informal ) An annoying or foolish person .

( British , Ireland , dialectal , archaic ) A person who chatters or gossips inanely ; a chatterer , a gossip or gossiper ; also, a person who divulges private information about others or is indiscreet ; a tattletale .

definitions.definition: A short , high-pitched call of a small bird , or a similar sound made by something else; a cheep , a chirp , a tweet .

main_definition: A short , high-pitched call of a small bird , or a similar sound made by something else; a cheep , a chirp , a tweet .

definitions.definition: ( chiefly US , informal ) Chiefly in the form in a twit : clipping of twitter ( “ a state of excitement or nervousness ” ) .

main_definition: ( chiefly US , informal ) Chiefly in the form in a twit : clipping of twitter ( “ a state of excitement or nervousness ” ) .

definitions.definition: Clipping of twitter ( “ a knot or other defect in a thread or yarn which hinders spinning or weaving ” ) .

main_definition: ( Northern England , Scotland , weaving , archaic ) Clipping of twitter ( “ a knot or other defect in a thread or yarn which hinders spinning or weaving ” ) .
